Seeing as how my personal beliefs are always coming under fire due to my sexuality, I felt inclined to elate on them.
 
 For one, I believe in Christ. I believe in His saving Grace from His sacrifice on the cross. I believe He died and rose again on the third day after, and that through simple faith we are all saved by Him.
 
 My personal account is well my own. I feel that in my teenage years I was seeking faith for all the wrong reasons. I was in the literal term a zealot. I would always carry around a bible at school, lecture others especially non believers, and refused to stop or heed any other form of opinion beside my own....
 
 Yet deep down I was lacking. I hated, and loathed myself because I would often have feelings of attraction toward other members of the same sex. Ever since 13 I felt miserable, and that I was some sort of sick twisted person.
 
 I soon became suicidal, attempted once, and spun in a vicious cycle. I was praying to God to make me "normal" make me right, and to cure me of my "disease". I often would have tears streaming down my face attempting to reconcile with a God I felt distant, and with a being I felt could never possibly love me.
 
 God's hand was on me one day when I had the barrel of a gun in my mouth... I had become so desperate at the age of 17 and hated everything about myself due to my sexuality that I literally wanted to end it that day....
 
 It was but for the saving grace of God that I didn't pull the trigger. Now years later with many emotional scars, and some physical that many of you know why I have come to a point of peace in my life through faith.
 
 
 I now realize I was seeking God for the wrong reasons, and that he loved me just the way I am. I am by no means a theologian. I cannot pin point exact scripture to counter peoples challenges to my belief, nor would I try. I find it futile.
 
 I find that faith is only relevant to you and your heart. Believe what you wish I can't change that. Only your own heart can make such a decision. A small one in courage, but a huge one perhaps for the better.
 
 
 This is my simple testament to faith in Jesus Christ. No I am not perfect. No I am not an expert. I just believe by simple pure ignorant faith. If any have reason to continue to belittle my beliefs and my feelings, and my heart then find something else better to do with your time.
 
 
 Don't try to tear away my beliefs just because you are unsure of yours. And don't try to score punches when you cry that your very beliefs are being attacked when you snipe others.
 
 That's all I have to say. I expect very soon for some very nasty responses but I've become used to it. After all I'm not really a Christian to some. Just some homosexual deviant who has nothing but his sexuality on his mind even though I have not had sex in months.....
 
 But just continue to snipe and slander. And for any of you considering maybe seeking a personal relationship with Jesus. It's not fake. I don't get a response back except when I least expect it. And it's for the better. If your so inclined go for it. Because Jesus does not discriminate. And Jesus loves you without condition.
 
 And unlike people, Jesus won't forsake you. That's all.
